price: ߣߌ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߖߊ߲߬ߓߌ߬ߟߊ߬ߟߌ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ، ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ ߦߌ߬ߟߊ߬ ߢߌߡߊ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲ߞߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߋ߬
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
